participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, sociable, and curious about the world.
participant_1.background: I'm not a student but I enjoy wine tours. I like many colors, but my favorites are green, blue, and red. my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school. I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade. i wish magic was real.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Reflective, caring, and enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_2.background: I gave my doberman a treat for being a good boy. I want to learn how to let things go and not be so hard on myself. I treat myself to something I've been wanting. I am content with my solitary lifestyle and enjoy spending time with my pets. I loved playing with my brother when we were kids.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm good! Just got back from a wine tour.
Oh that sounds fun! I've never been on a wine tour before.
You should go! It was really enjoyable. I got to try a bunch of different types of wines and learn about the process of making wine.
That sounds really cool! I'll have to look into it.
I'm sure you'd enjoy it. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my pets, read, and go for walks.
I love reading too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like mystery and suspense novels.
Me too! I love a good mystery.
What are some of your favorite mystery novels?
I love the Agatha Christie books. And I also like the Harry Bosch series by Michael Connelly.
I've heard good things about the Harry Bosch series. I'll have to check them out.
